author: rdonkin
msg: Introduce LoaderService and switch mailets to use it. JSR250 resource injection is now performed within PhoenixLoader. ServiceLocator is no longer needed.

author: shv
msg: HDFS-517. Merge -r 803338:804754 from trunk to branch HDFS-265.

author: jbellis
msg: Add "bootstrap mode" to node startup.  This causes the node to tell the
nodes that have data it needs to send it the data, and not otherwise
participate in reads or writes until the bootstrap is complete.
patch by Sandeep Tata; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-195

author: rdonkin
